Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Northwest/Ardmore
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Austin, Bryn Mawr and Nagle: due to, street blockage near Northwest/Ardmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland |buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Austin, Bryn Mawr and Nagle: due to, street blockage near Northwest/Ardmore.

Allow extra travel time.
